name: Yamaha Motor Europe N.V.
membership: Yamaha Motor Europe N.V. is member of ACEM and IMMA.
goal:
YAMAHA Motor Europe is responsible for co-ordinating the development marketing and sales activities of Yamaha Motor products in the European market, mainly: Yamaha motorcycles and scooters, marine outboard engines, Yam inflatable boats, water vehicles, 4-wheel all-terrain vehicles (ATV’s), golf cars, generators, snowmobiles and electro-hybrid bicycle systems.
Yamaha has also invested in facilities located in France, for production and Italy, for R&D which develop and manufacture a large range of products including motorcycles and scooters.
Yamaha Motor Corporation achieved a worldwide turnover in 2018 of € 13,7 billion and an operational profit of € 1.16 billion.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Emissions regulations (CO2,RDE, etc.)
Fuel consumption regulation
Free trade agreements
Regulations and technical specifications of BEV, PHEV, Hybrid and Powered Two Wheelers in general
Measures for market uptake and incentives for e-mobility and Powered Two Wheelers
Programs/incentives for e-infrastructure and PTW related mobility/saftey
Connected and automated mobility developments
